2.res: OK. Getting Veeru's Story.Virender Sehwag is a former Indian cricketer.Nicknamed ‘Veeru’ by teammates and fans. Widely regarded as one of the most destructive batsmen of all time, Sehwag played as an aggressive right-handed opening batsman and also bowled part-time right-arm off-spin. He played his first One Day International in 1999 and joined the Indian test side in 2001.
